title: Azure Sentinel Detection
description: Schema to codify Azure Sentinel detections. Based on aka.ms/sentinelrestapi

id.title: Detection ID
id.description: Unique ID specific to a detection

query_frequency.title: Query Frequency
query_frequency.description: The frequency (in ISO 8601 duration format) for this detection to run

query_period.title: Query Period
query_period.description: The period (in ISO 8601 duration format) that this detection looks at

severity.title: Severity
severity.description: The severity for alerts created by this detection

trigger_operator.title: Trigger Operator
trigger_operator.description: The operation against the threshold that triggers detection

display_name.title: Display Name
display_name.description: The display name for this detection

enabled.title: Enable Detection
enabled.description: Determines whether this detection is enabled or disabled

suppression_duration.title: Suppression Duration
suppression_duration.description: The suppression (in ISO 8601 duration format) to wait since last time this detection been triggered

suppression_enabled.title: Suppression Enabled
suppression_enabled.description: Determines whether the suppression for this detection is enabled or disabled

playbook_name.title: Playbook Name
playbook_name.description: Name of the playbook that should be triggered if the detection is triggered

query.title: Detection Query
query.description: The query that creates alerts for this detection

additional_metadata.title: Additional Metadata
additional_metadata.description: Additional metadata specific to an organization's installation of Sentinel

workitem_id.title: Work Item ID
workitem_id.description: Azure DevOps Work Item ID this detection is linked to

linked_data_sources.title: Linked Data Sources
linked_data_sources.description: Data sources that are needed by this detection. Make sure data source has been defined
